parameters.name: ThickDirType
parameters.description: Toggles the thickening direction: 0 = outside 1 = inside (default value)

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the bend

parameters.name: BFormed
parameters.description: True to insert a formed lofted bend; false to insert a bent lofted bend (default)

parameters.name: DRadius
parameters.description: Bend radius; valid only if BFormed is false

parameters.name: BReferToEndPoint
parameters.description: True to calculate facet transitions using theoretical vertexes, false to calculate facet transitions using the smallest possible arcs that avoid interference between bend areas; valid only if BFormed is false

parameters.name: EFacetOption
parameters.description: Faceting option as defined in swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e ; valid only if BFormed is false

parameters.name: DChordTol
parameters.description: Chord tolerance or maximum distance between the arc and linear segment of a chord; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swChordTolerance and BFormed is false

parameters.name: INumBends
parameters.description: Maximum number of bends per transition segment; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swBendsPerTransitionSegment and BFormed is false

parameters.name: DSegLength
parameters.description: Maximum length of the linear segment; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swSegmentLength and BFormed is false

parameters.name: DSegAngle
parameters.description: Maximum angle between adjacent linear segments; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swSegmentAngle and BFormed is false

title: IFeatureManager.InsertSheetMetalLoftedBend2
description: Inserts a lofted bend in a sheet metal part.
signature:
Feature InsertSheetMetalLoftedBend2( 
   System.Int32
ThickDirType
,
   System.Double
Thickness
,
   System.Boolean
BFormed
,
   System.Double
DRadius
,
   System.Boolean
BReferToEndPoint
,
   System.Int32
EFacetOption
,
   System.Double
DChordTol
,
   System.Int32
INumBends
,
   System.Double
DSegLength
,
   System.Double
DSegAngle
)

parameters.name: ThickDirType
parameters.description: Toggles the thickening direction: 0 = outside 1 = inside (default value)

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the bend

parameters.name: BFormed
parameters.description: True to insert a formed lofted bend; false to insert a bent lofted bend (default)

parameters.name: DRadius
parameters.description: Bend radius; valid only if BFormed is false

parameters.name: BReferToEndPoint
parameters.description: True to calculate facet transitions using theoretical vertexes, false to calculate facet transitions using the smallest possible arcs that avoid interference between bend areas; valid only if BFormed is false

parameters.name: EFacetOption
parameters.description: Faceting option as defined in swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e ; valid only if BFormed is false

parameters.name: DChordTol
parameters.description: Chord tolerance or maximum distance between the arc and linear segment of a chord; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swChordTolerance and BFormed is false

parameters.name: INumBends
parameters.description: Maximum number of bends per transition segment; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swBendsPerTransitionSegment and BFormed is false

parameters.name: DSegLength
parameters.description: Maximum length of the linear segment; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swSegmentLength and BFormed is false

parameters.name: DSegAngle
parameters.description: Maximum angle between adjacent linear segments; valid only if EFacetOption is set to swLoftedBendFacetOptions_e.swSegmentAngle and BFormed is false

remarks:
Before calling this method, you must select at least two sketch profiles that are on parallel planes. You can either multi-select them in the graphics area or call
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
with Mark = 1 for each sketch profile you want to select.
